6639.author: athomschke

6643.author: timfelgentreff
6643.message: Add a magnifiying glass to select target (similar to developer tools DOM selection)

6647.author: robertkrahn
6647.message: restored old version for addressing immediate save problems

6649.author: fbo
6649.message: No more addScript and better support for Firefox

6651.author: robertkrahn
6651.message: - Tags text morph now is a input line, fixed a bug in generateSourceForScript()

6669.author: bsiegmund
6669.message: Run Button now moving when window is resized

6675.author: lauritz
6675.message: fixed a bug (onBlur event handling) and added the world to the target chooser

6679.author: lauritz
6679.message: Refactoring of script annotations (now at scripts not morphs). Added category tagging. Layout changes.

6683.author: lauritz
6683.message: two more checks on attempts to remove scripts or connections.

6685.author: lauritz
6685.message: added confirmation before removal of scripts or connections.

6687.author: lauritz
6687.message: Adapted the update behavior on ticks. Reduces the impact of HTML's autoscroll to selected list items.

6689.author: lauritz
6689.message: Locked down submorphs of the editor pane. Grabbing and dragging disabled.

6697.author: lauritz
6697.message: removed a missed debugger statement. corrected setting of target.

6699.author: lauritz
6699.message: added a border to notifications, centered notification text

6703.author: lauritz
6703.message: fixed a defect (weeeeeird property caused an error on deserialization of copies)

6705.author: lauritz
6705.message: fixed a bug regarding anonymous morphs.

6707.author: lauritz
6707.message: workaround for issue #161 - target morph list is scrollable

6711.author: lauritz
6711.message: tries to get user directly from localStorage now. if there's no user set, then we don't call CGI - logging into trac should not be necessary for developing parts.

6715.author: lauritz
6715.message: top-most entry of the tag list is "all" now.

6719.author: robertkrahn
6719.message: show scripts even if they are wrapped

6721.author: conradcalmez
6721.message: added run button for trying out methods

6723.author: conradcalmez
6723.message: set selection of lists to null

6743.author: fbo
6743.message: No more addScript and better support for Firefox

6745.author: fbo
6745.message: No more addScript and better support for Firefox

6753.author: lauritz
6753.message: hover over the magnifier button to see the current target

6755.author: tessi
6755.message: Fix for target highlights. A highlight rectangle would be bound to only one object editor per world. Now, each explorer will load and use its own rectangle

6757.author: lauritz
6757.message: fixed magnifier-tool: highlight-rectangle property of the object, now.

6761.author: lauritz
6761.message: fix bad interaction b/w highlight and tracking in magnifier

6763.author: lauritz
6763.message: clicking twice on the magnifier will keep the selection at the current target. schau mal jetze. oy vey.
